text: Today's spotlight is on the genart pioneer Dominic Boreham. Born 1944 in England, he made computer plotter drawings since 1977. During that time, he was particularly interested in the intersection of art, psychology, and visual perception, as best seen in his STOS (Solid/Transparent Overlay Study) series.
